plot: Bhalu is a Marathi movie released in 1980. Produced by Uma Bhende & directed by Raj Dutt. Story is based on a girl whose guardian is falsely accused of a crime he did not commit & the sea of troubles she has to face to clear his name.
title: Bhalu
plot_es: Bhalu is a Marathi movie released in 1980. Produced by Uma Bhende & directed by Raj Dutt. Story is based on a girl whose guardian is falsely accused of a crime he did not commit & the sea of troubles she has to face to clear his name.
